title: Alternative Color Indicators
description: Learn about alternative ways to convey information

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Don't rely solely on color to convey important information. Use additional visual indicators.

icons.title: Icons
icons.desc: Use icons together with color to convey information

text.title: Text
text.desc: Add text labels to color indicators

shapes.title: Shapes
shapes.desc: Use different shapes to distinguish elements

examples.title: Examples
examples.content: Instead of using only red and green for statuses, add icons ✓ and ✗ or text labels 'Success' and 'Error'.
